scripts.build: rollup src/main.js --format umd --name "Sully" --file dist/$npm_package_config_version/sully-$npm_package_config_version.js; uglifyjs dist/$npm_package_config_version/sully-$npm_package_config_version.js -c -m -o dist/$npm_package_config_version/sully-$npm_package_config_version.min.js; echo 'Build compiled successfully.'
